title: User Annotations
description: Array of annotations of subjective-states/feelings of the user from the local storage

applicationId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the app originating the event. Read-only (added by Connect)

userId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the user originating the event. Read-only (added by Connect)

sessionId.description: Identifier of the session originating the event

userAnnotation.description: Feeling or emotion or subjective-state that is annotated by the user
